summary: esteban cambiasso has won all the major european competitions a player can during his illustrious career but revealed that keeping leicester city in the premier league would be up there with the best . the foxes are currently seven points adrift at the bottom of the table , with only eight games remaining . cambiasso refuses to give up and admits keeping leicester up will feel like winning a trophy .

aspect: 1. Esteban Cambiasso wants to save Leicester City from relegation.
2. He considers it like winning a trophy.
3. Cambiasso has a successful career with Inter Milan and other clubs.
4. He joined Leicester City in the summer and has become a key player.
5. Cambiasso is happy in the East Midlands and may stay beyond his current contract.
explain: Esteban Cambiasso, a former professional football player, now wants to help his current team, Leicester City, avoid relegation from the English Premier League. He recognizes the severity of the situation, as they currently sit at the bottom of the table with only eight games remaining in the season. Cambiasso is determined to turn things around and save his team from the drop, viewing it as a significant achievement comparable to winning one of the major European competitions he has conquered throughout his successful career.

Esteban Cambiasso, a former footballer, believes that keeping Leicester City in the Premier League, a top-tier football league in England, would be among the most significant achievements of his career, even though he has already won all the major European competitions as a player. He considers this feat to be like winning a trophy, emphasizing the significance of the challenge and the satisfaction achieved from overcoming adversity.

Esteban Cambiasso, a former professional footballer with an illustrious career, has won various major European competitions throughout his career, playing for clubs such as Inter Milan and Olympique de Marseille. Despite his successful career, Cambiasso believes that keeping Leicester City in the Premier League will be an achievement that he considers among his most significant accomplishments.

Esteban Cambiasso joined Leicester City in the Summer of 2021, making him a new player for the club at that time. Since his arrival, he has played a significant role in the team, quickly becoming a key player for them. This has been a crucial factor in helping the team navigate through the challenges they have faced in the 2021-2022 season of the Premier League. Cambiasso's experience and skill have contributed to the team's performance, making him an important asset to the squad.

Esteban Cambiasso, a renowned football player, is enjoying his time in the East Midlands and may extend his stay beyond his current contract. Despite playing for top clubs around the world, Cambiasso has found a sense of satisfaction in Leicester, which may lead to him prolonging his career with the Foxes. Although he initially signed a short-term deal, his performance and determination to help the team have earned him a strong bond with the fans and the club. The decision to stay will ultimately depend on mutual agreement between Cambiasso and Leicester City.
